thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: MSCI to Report Carbon Footprints of Indexes
thread.title_full: MSCI to Report Carbon Footprints of Indexes - WSJ

author: Ezequiel Minaya
title: MSCI to Report Carbon Footprints of Indexes
text:
MSCI Inc., a gatekeeper for trillions of investment dollars that track its various indexes, said Friday that it would begin reporting the carbon footprint of its flagship global equity indexes for clients seeking to track the environmental impact of their investments.
The New York-based company said it would begin reporting the information with 19 indexes on the way to making it uniform across all its products. The first group will...
